snippet: Two state boards announced they were considering opening a new round of bidding for a fourth casino license in the Southern Tier, after urging from Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo.
abstract: New York State's Gaming Facility Location Board and Gaming Commission announce possibility of new round of bidding for a fourth casino project, to be located in state's Southern Tier; licenses for three casinos in other regions of state have been approved, but none of the three would be close enough to bring jobs or economic development to sparsely populated area along Pennsylvania border.

byline.original: By CHARLES V. BAGLI and JESSE McKINLEY

lead_paragraph: Two state boards announced they were considering opening a new round of bidding for a fourth casino license in the Southern Tier, after urging from Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo.

headline.main: At Cuomo’s Request, Panel May Again Weigh Casino Bids for Southern Tier of New York
headline.print_headline: Area Upstate May Receive Second Look for a Casino

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York State Gaming Facility Location Board
